alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux; Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 19 at 12:05PM CST until December 19 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Fire Weather Zones 312 and 313... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 312 AND 313... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 6 PM MST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 312.Fire weather zone 313. * WIND...West-southwest winds winds at 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph can be expected this afternoon. * HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * HAINES...4 * THUNDERSTORMS...No thunderstorms are expected. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux; Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills
